    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SimpleMessageSystem()
      Instantiates a new SimpleMessageSystem without loading defaults or custom messages.
      SimpleMessageSystem​(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin javaPlugin)
      Instantiates a new SimpleMessageSystem with loading defaults but not custom messages.
      SimpleMessageSystem​(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin javaPlugin, org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection messagesConfiguration)
      Instantiates a new SimpleMessageSystem with default and custom messages.
